Package com.belgianwaffles

package com.belgianwaffles
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AnotherClassifier
    A classifier that doesn't really do anything.
    Classifier
    Abstract base class for all classifiers
    DataManager
    Representation of a data point in the training data set.
    FileManager
    A class for reading and writing to files.
    KNNClassifier
    K-Nearest Neighbors classifier that classifies a given data point to one of the orientations in the training data set by finding the K nearest neighbors and determines the most common orientation among them.
    Main
    Main entry point class for the program
    NNClassifier
    Nearest Neighbor classifier that classifies a given data point to one of the orientations in the training data set.
